title: IAA Tonight | The Dolphins Are Disciplined by the NFL
description: The Miami Dolphins have been disciplined for tampering after the team was found to have had impermissible contact with Tom Brady and Sean Payton. Was this penalty justified? Leger Douzable, LeSean McCoy & Omar Kelly discuss. Then, the team breaks down the blockbuster trade that saw All-Star outfielder Juan Soto traded to the San Diego Padres. Finally, LA Chargers WR Keenan Allen joins the show from Chargers Training Camp.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, LeSean McCoy, Omar Kelly, Keenan Allen)
